summary: a new immunochromatographic assay (ICA) based on monoclonal antibodies (mAbs) was developed in this study. fourteen mAbs against PEDV strain isolated from south of china were prepared. the optimal mAb 4A11 was coated on NC membrane as the capturing reagent. electronic supplementary material available to authorized users. additional files Additional file 1: (135.5KB, doc) Figure S1. Selection of capture and detection of mAbs of the new ICA for PEDV detection.
